title: Web
content:
Welcome to the Lytics JavaScript SDK documentation, where we will explore the capabilities and features of the Lytics JavaScript SDK. This SDK enables website owners and developers to integrate Lytics' powerful customer data platform directly into their websites and web applications.
With Lytics JavaScript SDK, you can easily collect data from website visitors and enrich their profiles with valuable insights, including behavior, preferences, and interests. By leveraging the Lytics JavaScript SDK, you can better understand your customers and deliver personalized experiences that drive engagement, retention, and revenue.
In this documentation, we will cover how to install and configure the Lytics JavaScript SDK and how to use it to identify users, manage consent, track events, and personalize experiences. We will also examine integrating Lytics JavaScript SDK with other third-party analytics and marketing platforms to create a complete web data strategy.
Whether you are a website owner, developer, or marketer, this documentation will provide you with the essential knowledge needed to leverage the Lytics JavaScript SDK to build better web experiences and gain deeper insights into your customers' behaviors and preferences.
Updatedalmost 2 years ago
